definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: That’s the pie chart you see above.
sentences.chinese: 那就是你在上面看到的餅狀圖。

sentences.english: They showed respondents three unlabeled pie charts.
sentences.chinese: 他們向被調查者出示了三張不帶標籤的餅狀圖。

sentences.english: Shows a pie chart with the percentages of the test results that passed and failed.
sentences.chinese: 顯示一個帶有通過與失敗測試結果百分比的餅狀圖。
